slogan: We save your rights and protect your business
aboutContent: Ahattah Law and Legal Consultations Co. was established as one of the specialized legal entities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It was established as a professional legal firm licensed by the Ministry of Commerce as well as licensed by the Saudi Bar Association, to meet the needs and aspirations of clients. The company includes a group of lawyers, legal and administrative consultants. The company also provides legal services to its clients with High quality and professional performance that serves individuals, companies and private establishments.
serviceContent01: Legal advice represents a protective way that gives you the legal opinion, which clarifies the position of the system in the matter and the legal point of view that gives you the advantage of full knowledge of the legal problems and obstacles that you may face before they occur, by choosing the service: • You will have knowledge of all the laws related to the subject of your consultation. • Protection from errors that are difficult to correct or afford. • Save time and effort.
serviceContent02: This service includes representing the client in front of all governmental, non-governmental, judicial and semi-judicial sectors via review, pleading and defending, preparing and drafting regulations and notes to ensure that the required result from the client is achieved.
serviceContent03: Establishing and registering establishments and companies, converting individual establishments into companies, following up on the issuance of licenses and commercial registrations, and preparing investment and partnership contracts.
serviceTitle04: Drafting and auditing contracts and agreements
serviceContent04: Preparing, drafting and auditing all types of contracts and legal agreements.
serviceTitle05: Reviewing the compliance of the enterprise legally
serviceContent05: Achieving government compliance and commitment is a goal that all entities seek. We follow up and verify the entities rules and regulations compliance by complying with all standards imposed by the law, as well as prevention of exposure to the legal violations.
serviceContent06: We prepare record of inheritance, wills and endowments documents, and their regulations, and supervise them professionally.
serviceContent07: Our company provides commercial arbitration services and related matters, as well as reconciliation and documentation services. Commercial arbitration is one of the matters that our company gives special importance to.
serviceContent08: Specialized in all types of debt collection cases for individuals, companies and establishments.
serviceContent09: We prepare franchise contracts to preserve the rights of clients and manage the contract professionally.
serviceContent10: Providing documentation services including emptying and selling real estate, notarizing corporate contracts, notarizing debts, financial statements, issuing and canceling all kind of agencies/ power of attorney’s and other legal documentation services.

package01.title: New Companies / Establishments
package01.description: Embark on a seamless journey of corporate success with our comprehensive Package, designed to cater to the diverse needs of new companies and establishments, this package is meticulously crafted to provide you with expert guidance and support throughout your legal and regulatory endeavors.
points: Preparing the internal regulations of the company
Reviewing the compliance of the company legally
explain: Benefit from our experienced legal professionals who will provide you with two dedicated sessions of expert advice, ensuring your business remains compliant and well-informed
Our skilled team will assist you in drafting two meticulously crafted contracts, tailored to your specific business requirements, helping you safeguard your interests and foster fruitful partnerships
Avail yourself of two comprehensive contract auditing sessions, where our experts will meticulously review your existing contracts, identifying potential risks and providing valuable recommendations

Establish a solid framework for your company's operations with our assistance in preparing the internal regulations of your organization. These regulations will guide your employees and ensure a smooth workflow
Establishing a solid framework for your company's operations is crucial for maintaining order, promoting efficiency, and ensuring a harmonious work environment
We will conduct a thorough review of your company's legal compliance, meticulously analyzing various aspects to ensure that you adhere to all relevant regulations and requirements
